import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TodoItem } from "../todoitem"; import { Model } from '../model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.css'] }) export class TodoComponent { displayAll: boolean = false; constructor() { } model = new Model(); getName() { return this.model.name; } addItem(value: string) { if (value != "") { this.model.items.push({ description: value, action: false }) } else { alert("bilgi giriniz.") } } getItems() { if (this.displayAll) { return this.model.items; } return this.model.items.filter(item => !item.action) } }

{{ getName() }} kullanıcısının listesi
